summary: After the death of his wife and child, an author travels to Barcelona to see his estranged brother and dying father, where he learns that his life is plagued by events that occur on 11/11/11.
cast: Timothy Gibbs|Michael Landes|Wendy Glenn|Benjamin Cook|Lolo Herrero|Salomé Jiménez|Brendan Price|Denis Rafter|Ángela Rosal|Lluís Soler|Jose Bertolero|Oscar Valsecchi|José Antonio Marín|Luis Alba|Jesus Cuenca|Titus Ferrer|Alejandro Gil|Joan Hustench|Susana Jin|Alex Llopis|Francesc Paez|Rubén Peñardilla|Pau Tural|Xavi Vara|Montse Alcoverro|Francesc Arellano|Mariví de Villanueva|Marvin Wicoff|Loris Curci|Anna Blasco|Emilie Autumn|J. LaRose|Patrizia Medrano
